successes.title: Mutant Chronicles 3rd Ed. RPG
successes.description: Modiphius unleashes the Dark Legion in the 3rd edition of the dieselpunk sci-fi RPG with brand new content & cinematic rules

Pledges.description: FAN - (Approx $8) A credit in the Dark Symmetry Core Book and Player's Guide. A pack of downloadable screen Wallpaper featuring inspirational new and existing art.
PLAYERS GUIDE PDF - (Approx $16) The Fan Pledge Level plus the 98 page Player's Guide in PDF.
DARK SYMMETRY CORE BOOK PDF - (Approx $32) Players Guide PDF Pledge PLUS 288 page PDF Dark Symmetry Core Rules & Setting Book

DARK SYMMETRY CORE BOOK PRINT - (Approx $64) Dark Symmetry PDF Pledge PLUS 288 page PRINTED Dark Symmetry Core Rules & Setting Book. SHIPPING: Please add £8/$13 UK/US, £12/$19 EU, £18/$29 Rest of the World. Weight: 1.13kg
PDF MASTER - (Approx $64) Dark Symmetry Core Book PDF Pledge PLUS all the book unlocked in PDF. This is the Pledge if you want everything in PDF!

MINIATURES ADEPT - (Approx $64) Dark Symmetry Core Book PDF Pledge PLUS £45 to spend on 3 miniatures sets (further free £15 value to be unlocked). SHIPPING: Please add £5/$8 UK/US, £7/$11 EU, £9/$14 Rest of the World. Weight: 0.27kg

PRINT MASTER - (Approx $96) Dark Symmetry Print Pledge PLUS The PRINTED Players Guide (when unlocked) PLUS all the books in PDF. SHIPPING: Please add £10/$16 UK, £11/$17 US, £16/$25 EU, £22/$35 Rest of the World. Weight 1.83kg
PDF STORY MASTER - (Approx $112) PDF Master Pledge PLUS get written in as an NPC in one of the books (no artwork). NB: PDF Master gets all the unlocked Add On's marked 'Book' in PDF. No Shipping.

GENEROUS GM - (Approx $128) Dark Symmetry  core rules & setting book in print PLUS four printed Player's Guides PLUS all the books in PDF. SHIPPING: Please add £10/$16 UK, £26/$41 US/EU, £37/$59 Rest of the World. Weight: 3.9kg

RETAILERS ONLY - (Approx $128) - REQUIRES VERIFICATION BY EMAIL (contact retail@modiphius.com) - Four copies of the Dark Symmetry Core Rules & Setting Book See Retailers section for more info. SHIPPING: Please add £10/$16 UK, £26/$41 US/EU, £37/$59 Rest of the World. Weight: 3.3kg

STORY MASTER - (Approx $144) Print Master Pledge PLUS get written in as an NPC in one of the books (no artwork) PLUS all the books in PDF. More will be unlocked with each new book. SHIPPING: Please add £10/$16 UK, £11/$17 US, £16/$25 EU, £22/$35 Rest of the World. Weight: 1.83kg

MINIATURES MASTER - (Approx $160) £120/$190 to spend on 8 miniatures sets (further free £15 value to be unlocked) PLUS all the books in PDF. SHIPPING: Please add £6/$9 UK/US, £7/$11 EU, £11/$17 Rest of the World. Weight: 0.72kg

COLLECTORS PRINT MASTER - (Approx $160) Dark Symmetry Core Book Collector's Edition with faux leather cover PLUS The PRINTED Players Guide (when unlocked) PLUS all the books in PDF. SHIPPING: Please add £10/$16 UK, £11/$17 US, £16/$25 EU, £22/$35 Rest of the World. Weight 1.83kg

PDF SUBSCRIPTION - (Approx $165) PDF Master PLUS All locked books in PDF (Includes 192 page Dark Eden Setting, Four 192 page campaigns: Dark Symmetry, Dark Legion, Dark Eden, Venusian Apocalypse), Art Book & Savage Worlds Conversion) PLUS ALL Mutant Chronicles PDF releases by Modiphius in 2014 & 2015. Note: There is a £60 Add On to upgrade other pledges to benefit from this. CURRENT SAVING: £150 (Will increase with new releases). Receive each book as it is released!

DARK SYMMETRY ART MASTER - (Approx $240) Print Master Pledge PLUS Get drawn in as a character in the Dark Symmetry Core Book, and feature in a short piece of storyline PLUS all the books in PDF. More Art pledges will be unlocked with each new book. SHIPPING: Please add £10/$16 UK, £11/$17 US, £16/$25 EU, £22/$35 Rest of the World. Weight: 1.83kg.

CARTEL ARTEFACT BAG & COLLECTORS EDITION - (Approx $256) Cartel Artefact Bag PLUS Dark Symmetry Core Book Collector's Edition PLUS The PRINTED Players Guide (now unlocked) PLUS all the books in PDF. SHIPPING: Please add £10/$16 UK, £26/$41 US/EU, £37/$59 Rest of the World. Weight: 2.5kg

NPC ART MASTER - (Approx $280) Print Master Pledge (Dark Symmetry Core Rules & Setting Book plus Players Guide in Print) PLUS Get drawn in as a character PLUS written in as an NPC in one of the books (we will try to cater to preference but this is not guaranteed) PLUS get written in to a short piece of storyline PLUS all the books in PDF. More Art pledges will be unlocked with each new book. SHIPPING: Please add £10/$16 UK, £11/$17 US, £16/$25 EU, £22/$35 Rest of the World. Weight: 1.83kg.

ART FANATIC - (Approx $320) Print Master Pledge PLUS Get drawn in as a character in the book of your choice and feature in a short piece of storyline PLUS receive an A3 Canvas Print of your art. More Art Pledges will be unlocked with each new book. SHIPPING: Please add £10/$16 UK, £26/$41 US/EU, £37/$59 Rest of the World. Weight: 2.53kg

MINIATURES COLLECTOR - (Approx $320) £240/$380 to spend on 16 miniatures sets (further £15 value to be unlocked) PLUS all the books in PDF. SHIPPING: Please add £8/$13 UK/US, £12/$19 EU, £18/$29 Rest of the World. Weight: 1.44kg

SETTING BOOK MASTER - (Approx $400) Print Master Pledge (Dark Symmetry Core Book PLUS Player's Guide PLUS All The PDF's) PLUS All the Guide Books (Mishima, Bauhaus, Imperial, Capitol, Cybertronic, Whitestar, The Brotherhood, Luna & Freelancers, Mutants & Heretics, Cartel) PLUS the Dark Soul Guide Book, PLUS the Dark Eden Setting book. Note this does not include ALL the books in print. SHIPPING: Please add £10/$16 UK, £26/$41 US/EU, £37/$59 Rest of the World. Weight: 12kg
NECROMAGUS - (Approx $640) ALL THE BOOKS unlocked in PRINT & PDF! SHIPPING: Please add £13/$24 UK, £30/$48 US/EU, £45/$72 Rest of the World. Weight: Variable based on Stretch goals unlocked.

NEPHARITE -  (Approx $1000) ALL THE BOOKS unlocked in print & PDF PLUS all the Accessories. SHIPPING: Please add £13/$24 UK, £30/$48 US/EU, £45/$72 Rest of the World. Weight: Variable based on Stretch goals unlocked.

DARK APOSTLE - (Approx $1440) All the books unlocked in print PLUS all the Accessories PLUS all the PDFs PLUS £240/$380 to spend on 16 miniatures sets (free £15 extra to be unlocked) PLUS Get drawn in to the book of your choice and featured in a short piece of storyline PLUS receive an A3 Canvas print of your art. More will be unlocked with each new book. SHIPPING: Please add £13/$24 UK, £30/$48 US/EU, £45/$72 Rest of the World. Weight: Variable based on Stretchgoals unlocked.

DARK SOUL - (Approx $1900) Dark Apostle Pledge PLUS have a humanoid size miniature produced based on your artwork and receive 10 copies. SHIPPING: Please add £13/$24 UK, £30/$48 US/EU, £45/$72 Rest of the World. Weight: Variable based on Stretchgoals unlocked.
